oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WATER PARTICLE VELOCITIES ON A BERM BREAKWATER
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Torum, Alf
van Gent, Marcel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: berm breakwater
particle velocity
breakwater
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Water particle velocities in waves running up and down a berm breakwater have been measured for several wave heights and wave periods with a Laser Doppler Velocimeter (LDV). The measured water particle velocities have been compared with velocities computed with the numerical model ODIFLOCS. There is a fanagreement between the calculated and measured velocities.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 23 (1992): Proceedings of 23rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Venice, Italy, 1992.
